answer: We provide a variety of high-quality online courses in Python, Machine Learning, Web Development, and Databases. We also offer personalized mentorship and career guidance.
We are always looking for talented individuals! Please check our careers page at [link to careers page] or email your resume to careers@siddhguide.com.
The price for each course varies. You can find detailed pricing information on the specific course page on our website. For the courses I have information about, please ask about a specific course.
For any issues with your Learning Management System (LMS) login or access, please contact our support team at lmsadmin@srisiddhanta.org. They will be happy to assist you.
